text:
@JudgeJeanine How about if the re-open crowd, who don't want to wear masks, and think this is a hoax... sign a waiver not to be treated for Covid-19 if they get sick?

When is Trump going to walk into a random McDonald's and buy his own hamburger? (or hamberder as he calls it)
